877.question: Do all the instances contain code-switching?

1-Table1-1.png: No, not all instances contain code-switching. Some instances show only one language, while others show a combination of both languages.

2-Table2-1.png: Yes, they perform annotation on the dataset, which includes examples of tweets and their translations.
2-Figure1-1.png: Yes, they perform annotation on the input image.
Yes, they use dropout in their LSTM model.
